column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////We decided to split a few appetizers: the pork hush puppies and the pork belly poutine. Both were so worth it and plenty for four people. I'm not a fan of steak fries but the ones in the poutine were super crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. The proportion between fries
column4: and cheese curds was awesome. So easy to get the perfect bite. The mustard that came with the hush puppies was delicious and I wanted to eat it with everything.
